title: Court of Serpents and Secrets
description: Reyna’s secrets pale in comparison to what Mazrith has been keeping from her. And now she knows what he is, he has nothing to lose.With the balance of power tipping, both Reyna and Mazrith will be forced to make choices. Save each other, or stop the monsters from ruling Yggdrasil.But love can turn even the sanest crazy, and if they can’t save each other, they may just become the monsters that threaten their world.This is the fourth and final book in the Shadow Bound Queen series, which is an adult fantasy romance inspired by Norse mythology. It is a slow-burn, enemies-to-lovers romance, packed with magic, mystery and above all - delicious romantic tension.*This blurb is as spoiler-free as possible!
author: Eliza Raine
